title: GIFT City hosts West Midlands mayoral delegation to advance India
description: The delegation included representatives from the West Midlands Growth Company, leading universities such as the University of Warwick, University of Birmingham, Birmingham City University, Aston University and Coventry University -- which has already established an international branch campus in GIFT City -- along with industry leaders from mobility, advanced manufacturing, energy, artificial intelligence and financial services, as well as members of the Birmingham Chamber of Commerce and trade bodies.

title: Backed by Anthropic, a Super PAC Begins Ad Blitz in Support of A.I. Regulation
description: The ads by Public First Action, which started airing on Monday, are part of an escalating political war over artificial intelligence before the midterm elections.
content:
A new ad campaign on Monday warned northern New Jersey residents that Congress could leave them vulnerable to harm by artificial intelligence.

title: 'Frightening' ChatGPT boss says AI is easier than growing a human
description: Sam Altman has been called 'anti-human' after comparing the energy used by artificial intelligence to what is needed to 'grow' a person
content:

title: Canadian PM Carney to visit India on Feb 26, meet with PM Modi
description: 'Prime Minister Carney will first visit Mumbai, then New Delhi, India, where he will meet with Prime Minister Narendra Modi. The leaders will focus on elevating and expanding the Canada-India relationship, with ambitious new partnerships in trade, energy, technology and artificial intelligence (AI), talent and culture, and defence. He will meet with business leaders to identify investment opportunities in Canada and create new partnerships between businesses in both nations,'
content:
Ottawa [Canada], February 23 (ANI): Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney will travel to India, , Australia and Japan from February 26 to March 7, an official statement from Carney's office said on Monday.
The focus during his visit will be on business... [4064 chars]

title: AI should empower, not replace software engineers, says Microsoft President Brad Smith
description: Microsoft President Brad Smith says artificial intelligence should enhance software engineers' skills, not replace them. He highlights AI's role in boosting productivity, improving IT services, and creating better jobs.
content:
